00167 struct solid
00168 {
00169    Id      solidno;                   /* solid identifier            */
00170    char    name[20];                  /* solid's name                */
00171 
00172 #ifdef __ROV__
00173    real    densrel;                   /* relative density of solid   */
00174    real    densabs;                   /* absolut density of solid    */
00175    real    areaproj;                  /* actual projected area       */
00176    vector  PrincDir;                  /* main direction              */
00177    int     type;                      /* type of solid               */
00178    int     geometria;                 /* geometric characteristic    */
00179    int     fronteira;                 /* boundary type of solid      */
00180    int     bareaproj;                 /* flag for proj area of solid */
00181    real    param1;                    /* first parameter             */
00182    real    param2;                    /* second parameter            */
00183    real    param3;                    /* third parameter             */
00184    real    param4;                    /* fourth parameter            */
00185    vector  center;                    /* center of the solid         */
00186    real    aux;                       /* auxiliary variable          */
00187    int     pos;                       /* relative position           */
00188    Id      corte;                     /* identifier for the cut line */
00189 #endif
00190 
00191    SPTYPE  nxt;                       /* pointer to next solid       */
00192    SPTYPE  prevs;                     /* pointer to previous solid   */
00193    DPTYPE  sshells;                   /* pointer to list of shells   */
00194    GPTYPE  group;                     /* pointer to a group          */
00195    APTYPE  oaxs;                      /* pointer to an axis          */
00196    BTYPE   box;                       /* enclosing box               */
00197    short   sbits;                     /* status bits                 */
00198    EulerCo eucoef;                    /* Euler's exp. coefficients   */
00199    char    dsp;                       /* flag - display/not display  */
00200    int     color;                     /* color qualifier             */
00201 
00202 #ifdef __curved_env__
00203    CURVE   *scurvs;                   /* curve information           */
00204 #endif
00205 };
00206 
00207 struct shell
00208 {
00209    Id     shellno;                    /* shell identifier            */
00210    DPTYPE nextd;                      /* pointer to next shell       */
00211    DPTYPE prevd;                      /* pointer to previous shell   */
00212    SPTYPE ssolids;                    /* back pointer to solid       */
00213    FPTYPE sfaces;                     /* pointer to list of faces    */
00214    EPTYPE sedges;                     /* pointer to list of edges    */
00215    VPTYPE sverts;                     /* pointer to list of vertices */
00216    BTYPE  box;                        /* enclosing box               */
00217    short  dbits;                      /* status bits                 */
00218    int    color;                      /* color qualifier             */
00219 };
00220 
00221 struct face
00222 {
00223    Id     faceno;                     /* face identifier             */
00224    DPTYPE fshell;                     /* back pointer to shell       */
00225    FPTYPE nextf;                      /* pointer to next face        */
00226    FPTYPE prevf;                      /* pointer to previous face    */
00227    LPTYPE flout;                      /* pointer to outer loop       */
00228    LPTYPE floops;                     /* pointer to list of loops    */
00229    vector feq;                        /* face equation               */
00230    BTYPE  box;                        /* enclosing box               */
00231    short  fbits;                      /* status information          */
00232    char   fvisi;                      /* display qualifier (y/n)     */
00233    int    color;                      /* color qualifier             */
00234    int    flag;                       /* flag da face                */
00235 };
00236 
00237 struct loop
00238 {
00239    Id     loopno;                     /* loop identifier             */
00240    FPTYPE lface;                      /* pointer to face             */
00241    LPTYPE nextl;                      /* pointer to next loop        */
00242    LPTYPE prevl;                      /* pointer to previous loop    */
00243    HPTYPE ledg;                       /* ring of halfedges           */
00244    short  length;                     /* length of loop              */
00245 };
00246 
00247 struct edge
00248 {
00249    Id     edgeno;                     /* edge identifier             */
00250    EPTYPE nexte;                      /* pointer to next edge        */
00251    EPTYPE preve;                      /* pointer to previous edge    */
00252    HPTYPE he1;                        /* pointer to halfedge         */
00253    HPTYPE he2;                        /* pointer to halfedge         */
00254    real   angle;                      /* angle - adjacent faces      */
00255    char   evis;                       /* display qualifier (y/n)     */
00256    char   eclp;                       /* clipping qualifier (y/n)    */
00257    vector svclp3;                     /* 3D clipping coordinates     */
00258    vector evclp3;                     /* 3D clipping coordinates     */
00259    vect2  svclp2;                     /* 2D clipping coordinates     */
00260    vect2  evclp2;                     /* 2D clipping coordinates     */
00261    int    color;                      /* color qualifier             */
00262 
00263 #ifdef __curved_env__
00264    int    fg_round;                   /* rounding value of edge      */
00265    int    fg_make;                    /*                             */
00266    real   t1;                         /* rounding parameter          */
00267    real   t2;                         /* rounding parameter          */
00268    real   t3;                         /* rounding parameter          */
00269    real   t4;                         /* rounding parameter          */
00270    real   d;
00271 #endif
00272 };

00274 struct halfedge
00275 {
00276    LPTYPE wloop;                      /* pointer to loop             */
00277    EPTYPE edg;                        /* edge of loop                */
00278    HPTYPE nxt;                        /* next halfedge               */
00279    HPTYPE prv;                        /* previous halfedge           */
00280    VPTYPE vtx;                        /* starting vertex             */
00281 #ifdef __VIRTUAL_MEM
00282    HPTYPE nexth;                      /* pointer to the next halfedg */
00283 #endif
00284 #ifdef __curved_env__
00285    CURVE  *curv;                      /* curve information           */
00286    real   r;                          /* radius of starting vertex   */
00287 #endif
00288 };

00290 struct vertex
00291 {
00292    Id     vertexno;                   /* vertex identifier           */
00293    HPTYPE vedge;                      /* pointer to a halfedge       */
00294    VPTYPE nextv;                      /* pointer to next vertex      */
00295    VPTYPE prevv;                      /* pointer to previous vertex  */
00296    int    fg_round;                   /* rounding flag of vertex     */
00297    int    fg_make;
00298    vector vcoord;                     /* vertex coordinates          */
00299 };
